definition[0]: someone who is vulnerable can be easily harmed or hurt
example[0]: He took advantage of me when I was at my most vulnerable.
example[1]: We work mainly with the elderly and other vulnerable groups.
example[2]: Children are most vulnerable to abuse within their own home.
definition[1]: a place, thing, or idea that is vulnerable is easy to attack or criticize
example[3]: The fort was vulnerable to attack from the north.
example[4]: Their theories were badly thought out and very vulnerable to ridicule.
